description: Demolition of existing buildings; erection of 3 three/four/five storey buildings comprising 5 class B1 (business use) units, 6 live work units, 56 two bedroom, 10 one bedroom and 14 three bedroom flats; erection of 2 two bedroom, 7 three bedroom and 1 four bedroom terraced houses; formation of access road and provision of associated parking
